SEARCH
Package com.hexaware.payxpert.dao

Interface IFinancialRecordDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
FinancialRecordDao
public interface IFinancialRecordDao
The IFinancialRecordDao interface defines methods for FinancialRecord-related database operations such as retrieving financial records by ID, employee ID, and date. Implementing classes must provide concrete implementations for these methods.
Since:
2024-02-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
Praveen Kumar Kuruba

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<FinancialRecord>
    getFinancialRecordByEmployeeId(int employeeId)
    Retrieves all financial records associated with a specific employee from the database.
    FinancialRecord
    getFinancialRecordById(int recordID)
    Retrieves a financial record by its ID from the database.
    List<FinancialRecord>
    getFinancialRecordsForDate(String recordDate)
    Retrieves all financial records for a specific date from the database.

  • Method Details

    • getFinancialRecordById

      FinancialRecord getFinancialRecordById(int recordID)
      Retrieves a financial record by its ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      recordID - The ID of the financial record to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The FinancialRecord object if found, otherwise null.

    • getFinancialRecordByEmployeeId

      List<FinancialRecord> getFinancialRecordByEmployeeId(int employeeId)
      Retrieves all financial records associated with a specific employee from the database.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee for whom financial records should be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of FinancialRecord objects.

    • getFinancialRecordsForDate

      List<FinancialRecord> getFinancialRecordsForDate(String recordDate)
      Retrieves all financial records for a specific date from the database.
      Parameters:
      recordDate - The date for which financial records should be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of FinancialRecord objects.
